src_original: prāg ūrdhvaṃ ca vyakter avasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate,
tgt_original: prāgūrddhvaṃ ca vyakteravasthitaṃ rūpaṃ pradīpaghaṭasaṃyogena vyajyate |

src_original: tathā ca śabdo 'py avasthito bherīdaṇḍasaṃyogena vyajyate dāruparaśusaṃyogena vā,
tgt_original: tathā śabdo vyavasthito bherīkarṇṇasaṃyogena dāruparṇayogena vā vyajyate |

src_original: ayam ahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt/  vyañjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṅgyasya rūpasya vyaktir atyeti/  sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati,
tgt_original: ayamahetuḥ kālātyayāpadeśāt vyaṃjakasya saṃyogasya kālaṃ na vyaṃgyasya rūpasya vyaktiratyeti sati pradīpasaṃyoge rūpasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati |

src_original: nivṛtte dāruparaśusaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle/
tgt_original: nivṛtte tu dāruparṇasaṃyoge dūrasthena śabdaḥ śrūyate vibhāgakāle seyaṃ śabdasya vyaktiḥ saṃyogakālamatyetīti saṃyoganimittā bhavati |
tasyopakṣepasyābhyupagama eva yaḥ sa evottarāpratipattiriti tāvataivottarāpratipattimātreṇaivāparatra doṣaprasañjanāt |

src_original: tad yadā na pratipadyate tadā nigṛhīto bhavati//18//  NyS_5,2.19: kāryavyāsaṅgāt kathāvicchedo vikṣepaḥ //  yatra kartavyaṃ vyāsajya kathāṃ vyavacchinatti --- idaṃ me karaṇīyaṃ vidyate,  tasmin avasite paścāt kathayāmīti,
tgt_original: pūrvasādhananigrahasya sataḥ prativādinaḥ āpannaḥ prāpto nigraho yena tasyeti ceti vigrahaḥ |  paradoṣopakṣepasya matānujñālakṣaṇasyānapekṣaṇīyatvātparājitaparājayābhāvāditi bhāvaḥ || 0 ||  nigrahaprāptasyānigrahaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahaprāptasyo(pe)

src_original: vikṣepo nāma nigrahasthānam/  ekanigrahāvasānāyāṃ kathāyāṃ svayam eva kathāntaraṃ pratipadyata iti//19//
NyS_5,2.20: svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaprasaṅgo matānujñā //  yaḥ pareṇa coditaṃ doṣaṃ svapakṣe 'bhyupagamyānuddhṛtya vadati --- bhavatpakṣe 'pi samāno doṣa iti,
tgt_original: kaḥ punaridaṃ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇaṃ nigrasthānaṃ codayati |  na tāvat paryanuyojya iti yuktaṃ |

src_original: sa svapakṣe doṣābhyupagamāt parapakṣe doṣaṃ prasañjayan paramatam anujānātīti matānujñāṃ nāma nigrahasthānam āpadyata iti//20//  NyS_5,2.21: nigrahasthānaprāptasyānigrahaḥ paryanuyojyopekṣaṇam //  paryanuyojyo nāma nigrahopapattyā codanīyaḥ,
tgt_original: asambhavāt |  na hyasti sambhavo yat paradoṣapratipādanārthamātmano doṣavatvamasāvabhyupeti |
